00028 class rlDataAcquisition
00029 {
00030 public:
00031   // shared memory header
00032   typedef struct
00033   {
00034     char ident[4];          // must be "daq"
00035     int  maxItemNameLength; // maximum length of an item name
00036     int  maxNameLength;     // maximum length of the item value
00037     int  numItems;          // number of items in shared memory
00038     int  readErrorCount;    // 0...65536 incremented by each read error
00039     int  writeErrorCount;   // 0...65536 incremented by each write error
00040     int  spare[8];          // for future use
00041     char cspare[32];        // for future use
00042   }SHM_HEADER;
00043   
00044   enum DAQ_ENUM
00045   {
00046     DAQ_ERROR = 256*256*128
00047   };
00048

00054   virtual    ~rlDataAcquisition();

00056   int         intValue(const char *variable);
00057   float       floatValue(const char *variable);

00059   int         writeIntValue(const char *variable, int value);
00060   int         writeFloatValue(const char *variable, float value);
00061   int         readErrorCount();
00062   int         writeErrorCount();
00063   const char *firstVariable();
00064   const char *nextVariable();
00065   int         shmStatus(); // 0 if shared memory is ok | DAQ_ERROR if shared memory is not ok
